Sentence.sentence: Now it seems that a hand gun was found in your luggage.
Yes, but… W: According to the statement you made, you had never seen the hand gun before it was found in your bag
Kumar that to bring a hand gun into Hong Kong without proper authorization is a serious offense.
Maybe so, but someone managed to get that hand gun onto the aircraft or it couldn't have been there

means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 冈恩 Gunn的变体

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"枪，炮"之意。
means: cannon在军事上，现在gun指火炮，取代了cannon这一名词。

example.en: l knew they would bring in the big guns at the last minute.
example.zh: 我早就知道在最后时刻他们会把那些大人物搬出来的。

example.en: Against these big critics' big guns. I offer Serban & Co. some shelter.
example.zh: 我为塞班公司捉供挡箭牌来对付那些大批评家的抨击。

word_mean: harpoon 由炮、GE89D和GE89D索等部分组成，用于猎捕鲸类的渔具。

Sentence.sentence: But they will have to find the were-rabbit before gun-crazy hunter victor Quartermaine who is desperate to kill it.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Jeff had hunted in Lowa before Thanksgiving with his dog, Rosie, but the gun shots had scared the dog off.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

sentences.en: The doctors also wore guns at their waist.
sentences.cn: 医生们的腰间也带着手枪。

sentences.en: The guns destroyed the enemy's position.
sentences.cn: 大炮摧毁了敌人的阵地。

means.word_mean: 发令枪声, 起跑信号

sentences.en: The criminal gunned the policeman down and escaped.
sentences.cn: 罪犯将警察击伤, 逃走了。

sentences.en: The motorcycle gunned through the streets.
sentences.cn: 摩托车加大油门穿过街道。

sentences.en: The pilot of the airplane gunned his engine for a sharp climb.
sentences.cn: 飞行员加大油门使飞机急剧爬升。</seg>

jx.jx_en_mean: To pursue relentlessly so as to overcome or destroy.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 追逐，搜捕：全力追逐以便征服或毁灭

jx.jx_en_mean: To go after in earnest; set out to obtain
jx.jx_cn_mean: 竭力谋求：热切地追求；着手去获得
(非正式)（重要的或有权力的）大人物

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)act before the proper or appropriate time
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)在正常（或适当）的时间之前行动，过早行动

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)refuse to compromise or change, despite criticism
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)拒绝妥协；坚持自己的立场

lj.lj_ly: we have stuck to our guns on that issue.
lj.lj_ls: 在那个问题上我们坚持了自己的立场。

lj.lj_ly: the top guns in contention for the coveted post of chairman.
lj.lj_ls: 争夺为众人觊觎的主席之位的大佬们。

jx.jx_en_mean: To proceed or perform with great speed, skill, or success.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 全速进行，大获成功：以很快的速度、高超的技巧或巨大的成功从事或完成

jx.jx_en_mean: Under great pressure or under threat.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 处于巨大的压力或威胁之下

entry.def: A gun is a weapon from which bullets or other things are fired.

example.ex: He produced a gun and he came into the house...
The inner-city has guns and crime and drugs and deprivation.
example.tran: 市中心的贫民区充斥着滥用枪支、犯罪、吸毒和贫困问题。

entry.def: A gun or a starting gun is an object like a gun that is used to make a noise to signal the start of a race.

example.ex: The starting gun blasted and they were off.
example.tran: 发令枪响了，他们冲了出去。

entry.def: To gun an engine or a vehicle means to make it start or go faster by pressing on the accelerator pedal.
entry.tran: 把…发动起来；给…加大油门；使加速

example.ex: He gunned his engine and drove off.

entry.def: If you come out with guns blazing or with all guns blazing, you put all your effort and energy into trying to achieve something.

example.ex: The company came out with guns blazing.
example.tran: 公司鼓足了劲要大干一番。

entry.def: If you jump the gun, you do something before everyone else or before the proper or right time.

example.ex: It wasn't due to be released until September 10, but some booksellers have jumped the gun and decided to sell it early.
example.tran: 这本书定于9月10号发行，但是一些书商已抢先一步，决定提前销售。

entry.def: If you stick to your guns, you continue to have your own opinion about something even though other people are trying to tell you that you are wrong.
entry.tran: 坚持自己的立场；固执己见；一意孤行

example.ex: He should have stuck to his guns and refused to meet her.
example.tran: 他本应坚持己见，拒绝与她会面。

means.word_mean: 1. a weapon that discharges a missile at high velocity (especially from a metal tube or barrel)
3. a person who shoots a gun (as regards their ability)
4. a professional killer who uses a gun
5. a hand-operated pump that resembles a gun; forces grease into parts of a machine
6. a pedal that controls the throttle valve;
7. the discharge of a gun as signal or as a salute in military ceremonies;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English gunne, gonne, perhaps from a pet form of the Scandinavian name Gunnhildr, from gunnr + hildr, both meaning 'war'

sentences.en: It wasn't due to be released until September 10, but some booksellers have jumped the gun and decided to sell it early.

sentences.en: The company came out with guns blazing.

sentences.en: He produced a gun and he came into the house...

sentences.en: I saw a man leveling a gun at a crow.

sentences.cn: 两只赛艇的队员在紧张地等待着发令枪声.
sentences.en: The two crews now tensely awaited the sound of gun.

sentences.cn: 径赛运动员通常是在听到发令枪声后从跑道上起跑.
sentences.en: Track events usually begin in the lanes at the firing of a starting gun.

sentences.cn: 水枪是孩子们爱玩儿的一种玩具喷射器.
sentences.en: The water gun is a kind of spraying apparatus loved by children.

sentences.cn: 丘吉尔鳄鱼挥舞着一管6磅的炮和一具恐怖的火焰喷射器.
sentences.en: The Churchill Crocodile wields a 6 Pounder gun and a fearsome flame projector.

sentences.cn: 操作指南: 鼠标控制, 左键点击吸血蝙蝠射击.
sentences.en: Operate guidebook: The mouse control, the left key clicks to absorb blood bat gunning.

sentences.cn: 因为只能看见枪管, 所以无法直接从谷仓位置对其射击.
sentences.en: Only the gun barrels are visible, so a clean shot from the barn is impossible.

sentences.cn: 并据此对低温感发射装药弹道性能进行了模拟计算,发现计算结果与火炮实际射击结果基本相符.
sentences.en: We find the imitate result almost equal to the actual result of gun.

sentences.cn: 本课题主要研究火炮直瞄射击训练模拟系统.
sentences.en: The paper mainly studies the stimulating training system when gun direct firing.

sentences.cn: 这是一个机关枪安装在机械车, 提供准确的射击与最佳效率.
sentences.en: It was a gun mounted on a robotic car, which provided accurate shots with average power.

sentences.cn: 在诸多影响射击精度的因素中,膛口流场对弹丸的扰动是一个重要因素.
sentences.en: Numerical computation results of gun muzzle flow field which arranged in time was obtained.

sentences.cn: 我方大炮持续不断地向敌人射击.
sentences.en: Our guns blazed away at the enemy.

sentences.cn: 指挥官命令士兵们扳起击枪,准备射击.
sentences.en: The commander ordered the soldiers to set their guns at full cock.

sentences.cn: 高射炮: 从地面或甲板上射击的抵御空袭的火炮.
sentences.en: Antiaircraft gun : Artillery piece fired from the ground or shipBoard in defense against aerial attack.

sentences.cn: 当凯文拔出枪来,在车中间的隔板窗后连续射击了几枪,杰克一点都没慌乱.
sentences.en: Jack doesn't flinch when Carroll draws a gun and shoots repeatedly at the partition.

sentences.cn: 猎人射击前仔细瞄准.
sentences.en: The hunter sighted carefully before firing his gun.

sentences.cn: 你 ( 用枪 ) 射击什麽 呢 ?
sentences.en: What are you shooting ( your gun ) at?

sentences.cn: 他慢慢地走过草地, 把枪对准狮子就射击了.
sentences.en: Walking slowly across the grass, he pointed the gun at the lion and fired.

sentences.cn: 机关枪在不停地射击.
sentences.en: The machine gun is banging away.

sentences.cn: 高炮要准确射击必须准确确定和修正初速偏差量.
sentences.en: Precision fire of AA gun must accurately confirm and correct muzzle velocity deviation and adjustment.

sentences.cn: 枪在射击后向后坐.
sentences.en: A gun recoils after being fired.

sentences.cn: 他常于劳动间隙用土枪练射击, 学武艺.
sentences.en: He often uses earthy gun experienced fire at work space, learn skill in wushu.

sentences.cn: 曾经想用射钉枪射击的事? 嗯, 下面是你的机会!
sentences.en: Ever wanted to shoot things with a nail gun? Well, here's your chance!

sentences.cn: 用枪射击的结果.
sentences.en: Result of shooting with a gun.

sentences.cn: 士兵们把枪再装上子弹准备射击.
sentences.en: The soldiers recharged their guns and prepared to fire.

sentences.cn: 高射炮开始射击.
sentences.en: The antiaircraft guns opened up.

sentences.cn: 枪的瞄准器必须与射击目标对准成一线.
sentences.en: The sights of the gun must be in alignment with the target.

sentences.cn: 用这种机枪射击,你不可能一口气连射两夹子弹.
sentences.en: With this machine gun you could never fire off more than two magazines without a break.

sentences.cn: 他端着枪准备射击.
sentences.en: He is holding a gun at the ready.

sentences.cn: 他向寺庙开枪射击.
sentences.en: He bursts into the temple gun blasting.

sentences.cn: 哈米特的枪打响了. 这是个模拟射击, 打在金属环稍后一点的位置 ( 莉莲赫尔曼 )
sentences.en: Hammett's gun went off. The shot was a beauty , just slightly behind the eyes ( Lillian Hellman )

sentences.cn: 用你的枪瞄准靶心,然后射击.
sentences.en: Train your guns on the target then take the shot.

sentences.cn: 这枪可以用小石子射击兔子.
sentences.en: This gun can snoot small stones at rabbits.

sentences.cn: 他教玛丽如何射击.
sentences.en: He taught Mary how to shoot a gun.

sentences.cn: 他把枪口对准狐狸射击.
sentences.en: He aimed his gun at a fox and fired.

sentences.cn: 如果一个人打猎而且还有自己的枪，你还想指望什么？
sentences.en: If a guy hunts and owns guns, what do you expect?

Sentence.sentence: A medium-sized young man carrying a gun.
